definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享页面时，您可以将用户指定为查看者或编辑者。

sentences.english: Standing on the starting line, we're all cowards.
sentences.chinese: 站在起跑线上，我们都是胆小者。

sentences.english: The best of America's skaters beamed for the camera.
sentences.chinese: 最佳美国的溜冰者为照相机放光了。

sentences.english: The Reapers' mines are definitely multi-purpose.
sentences.chinese: 收割者的雷肯定是多用途的。

sentences.english: So in the interest of helping out the next generation of thieves, I'm going to offer you a few pointers.
sentences.chinese: 所以，为了有助于下一代游荡者们，我准备教你几招。

sentences.english: Asylum seeker numbers in Australia have reached 6900.
sentences.chinese: 此外，在澳寻求庇护者的人数已达6900人。

sentences.english: So you testify against yourselves that you are the descendants of those who murdered the prophets.
sentences.chinese: 这就是你们自己证明，是杀害先知者的子孙了。

sentences.english: And light multitaskers might be better at preserving their attention.
sentences.chinese: 并且轻度的一心多用者可能更擅长保持注意力。

sentences.english: Applicants should not be receiving any other bursary schemes.
sentences.chinese: 申请者不应是其他助学金计划的领受者。

sentences.english: This congressman is clever at making scores off hecklers at public meetings.
sentences.chinese: 这位国会议员擅长在公众集会上驳倒诘难者。

sentences.english: My original intention was to make clothing for amputees.
sentences.chinese: 我的初衷是给截肢者做衣服。

sentences.english: But there's not much risk of interlopers.
sentences.chinese: 但是并没有多少来自闯入者的竞争威胁。

sentences.english: This message contains a request to return a notification about your reception of the message.
sentences.chinese: 这封信要求回复信件处理通知给寄件者。

sentences.english: Conclusion The above procedure is necessary for the ankle sprains with the injury of the common peroneal nerve.
sentences.chinese: 结论踝扭伤出现腓总神经损伤者应作探查松解减压术。

sentences.english: In the hall, the shallow challenger shall be allowed to swallow the swallows.
sentences.chinese: 在大厅里，浮浅得挑衅者将被容许吞下燕子。

sentences.english: The lake lies low by the hill, a tearful entreaty of love at the foot of the inflexible.
sentences.chinese: 湖躺在山脚下，像在执拗者的跟前含泪恳求爱。

definition: ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
to be considered to be/to be defined to be/to be called
namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
artificial/man-made/having human cause or origin/human attempt or effort
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
